content: पणः {@--1@} Playing with dice or for a stake. {@--2@} A game played for a stake, bet, wager; <ls>Y. 2. 18</ls>; दमयंत्याः पणः साधुर्वर्ततां <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} The thing staked. {@--4@} A condition, compact, agreement; सांधिं करोतु भवतां नृपतिः पणेन <ls>Ve. 1. 15</ls>; ‘a stipulation, treaty’; <ls>H. 4. 118</ls>, <ls n="H. 4.">119.</ls> {@--5@} Wages, hire. {@--6@} Reward. {@--7@} A sum in coins or shells. {@--8@} A particular coin equal in value to 80 {%cowries%}; अशीतिभिर्वराटकैः पण इत्यभिधीयते. {@--9@} Price. {@--10@} Wealth, property. {@--11@} A commodity for sale. {@--12@} Business, transaction. {@--13@} A shop. {@--14@} A seller, vendor. {@--15@} A distiller. {@--16@} A house. {@--17@} Expense of an expedition. {@--18@} A handful of anything. {@--19@} An epithet of Viṣṇu.
